summary: The diff updates the MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal to use specific headline/body copy (with emojis/punctuation), preserves a top-right X close control, and adds a default media image that is shown when no selfie is selected, with state reset on close. However, the required new default image asset is not shown as added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` in this diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new default celebration image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it directly from the modal component.
missing_requirements.reason: The modal references `/assets/generated/celebration-default-photo.dim_900x700.png`, but the diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence the required image was actually added to `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
evidence: File diff summary shows "Added: 0" and "ADDED FILES: - none"
